response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us and has been meticulously designed to cater to your needs. Considering its worth to us and its potential benefits to you, I propose a price of $950,000 for the product. This offer aims to strike a balance between compensating us fairly for our investment and providing you with an opportunity to acquire something of significant value at a competitive price. We believe this is a win-win proposition and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
